attributes.action: Reccomend that Paul James Ward be honoured with a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paul James Ward who is a Drag Artiste named Charity Case on the Costa Del Sol has raised so much money for British Charities in Spain.
Some of the monies he has raised has helped people with Cancer, Asthma, Cystic Fibrosis as well as a host of other charities.
